horoscopes.title: Aries Weekly Horoscope Starting February 15
content: A significant solar eclipse in Aquarius will activate the eleventh house for Aries Sun, Moon, and rising signs, influencing long term plans. This event is anticipated to bring adjustments in friendships and collaborative settings, with these shifts developing over the next six months. You may experience new social connections or professional associations, such as joining a new group or obtaining new employment. Job seekers should prepare to leverage emerging opportunities. Additionally, the eleventh house relates to elder siblings and older individuals, suggesting increased engagement with them.

You will have collective projects, and collaborative project will suddenly come up, and it will be there for a long time. Mars is also in this eclipse zone, so you may have issues with your team mates, so make sure you keep a good vibe with them. Those who work in research, science, technology, NGO, and finance sector will get new business ideas, which can give them long term profits too. Due to the Martian aspect the social expectations will be a bit overwhelming too, and you have to control your speech, as that will be the major cause of conflicts.

After the eclipse, the Sun will move into Pisces, and it will join Mercury and Venus in Pisces, which will be a bit complex as the twelfth house indicates isolation and detachment. Your emotional self needs healing, so there are chances to meet people like healers, therapists, and spiritual practitioners. The twelfth house indicates updates about foreign collaborations, or foreign travels, so if you were looking for a travel, the next thirty days will bring such opportunities. You may also have rivalry with your colleagues, so please keep a safe distance from them.

horoscopes.title: Taurus Weekly Horoscope Starting February 15
content: For Taurus Sun, Moon and rising signs will have intense focus on career and workplace as a powerful solar eclipse in the tenth house. So, Taurus Sun, Moon and rising signs will try to find a new job or a new responsibility at work will be coming up in the next six months. Your livelihood will be the main theme for that duration of time, so job seekers, and those who look for promotions also will have the right time to bring some progress. Please make sure you keep a good behaviour at work, especially with your managers you need to be very respectful as there are chances for arguments, and that can negatively impact your career.

The Sun and Mars will aspect the fourth house, so family will be also important, as there will be some responsibilities, and you have to take care of them. Mars is the indicator of land, so you will have some real estate deals, like construction, renovation or you may purchase some home improvement items so that you can better lifestyle. Both the planets are malefics, so there will be arguments with family members, and that can create factions within the family. You can also expect family functions, and spiritual rituals also.

The Sun will move into Pisces, and it will join Mercury and Venus, so the eleventh house of long term relationships will be activated for the next few days. This will open the doors to join a new team , or you may even get a new friend during this transit, so job seekers should use this opportunity to get a new job. Promotions are also possible, and this transit will bring better communication with your team members. Those who work in space related domain, technology, and finance will have new opportunities.

horoscopes.title: Gemini Weekly Horoscope Starting February 15
content: The third week of February will witness a very powerful solar eclipse in the ninth house of foreign collaborations and spirituality. The solar eclipse is a kind of new moon, and it will bring new beginnings like a new foreign collaboration, or you will have a plan for long trip in the next six months. The impact of the solar eclipse will last for the next six months, so you will begin a new academic program in the next six months, or you will appear in an important exam. You will also get some updates about legal issues, visas or such processes, which you were working for a long time.

Your perspective about the work will have a dramatic shift, as you will get many opportunities to interact with an international community. Mars is also the part of this eclipse so, you will have some arguments with your siblings, elders and teachers, and you must avoid that. There will be opportunities for international work, media, writing, or spiritual studies, and you will also try to go for a long trip. The Sun and Mars will aspect the third house, so multitasking will be there, and you have to take care of your health also.

The Sun will move into Pisces, which rules your tenth house, and it will conjunct Mercury and Venus, so your career will automatically gain importance. You may receive some support from your managers, and there are chances to get some recognition too. There will be plenty of opportunities to prove your skills, and presence, and that will place you in the forefront of authorities. There will be important updates about the upcoming projects, so you should be alert. There will be important conversations, negotiations, paper works, contracts and discussions with your managers. Those who work in media, public domain and business also will get new opportunities.

horoscopes.title: Cancer Weekly Horoscope Starting February 15
content: The third week of February will witness a powerful solar eclipse in your eighth house, and this is a complex event, as the eighth house indicates finances and ups and downs. This is a turning point in your financial matters as well as emotional bonds. There will be sudden development around loans, settlements, insurance matters or joint assets, so these changes will push you to take some decisions. Sudden financial needs also will arise, and it can also for medical needs. If you are going through a relationship issues, despite the relationship is personal or business. You will try to start long-term change regarding financial matters and your emotional needs.

Mars is also in the axis of eclipse, and it will aspect the eleventh house of long term plans, friendships and collective projects. Martian aspect in the eleventh house will increase the importance of long term relationships, and this is a complex aspect. If you were having a stressed relationship with your team members, then it can get aggravated during this time. You can expect online and offline meetings, brain storming sessions, and you will also get some opportunities to join a team as well. Please try to avoid any kind of risky investments or avoid joining any new financial projects during this time.

After the eclipse the Sun will move into Pisces, and it will join Mercury and Venus there, so your focus will shift toward studies and spirituality. There will be opportunities for higher studies, and this is a very good time for attempting the exams. You will also get opportunities for pilgrimages, and read spiritual text. Travelling and interaction with an international community will be coming up, and you will surely get some benefits through that. If you were having some paper works regarding visa or other legal process, Venus will bring positive updates.

horoscopes.title: Leo Weekly Horoscope Starting February 15
content: There will be a powerful solar eclipse taking place in your seventh house of personal and business relationships. You can expect significant developments in your relationship sector despite personal or business, and these developments will reshape your destiny regarding the relationship. If you are going through some relationship issues, it will get aggravated, but you will get a long time to solve them as well, as the impact of the solar eclipse will last for the next six months. Single Leo natives may get committed in this time, formalize a partnership or sign an important deal. There will be a series of public events in the coming six months.

Mars will aspect the tenth house, so, the career related matters also will get highlighted, so please use this time to empower yourself, so that you can get the best opportunities to grow professionally. Mars will bring some discussions with your managers, and make sure you keep your cool, otherwise your harsh speech can damage your reputation at work. Job seekers will get the closest opportunities to get a new job in the next few months too. Your financial matters also will get highlighted due to the Martian aspect, but this is a complex one.

After the solar eclipse, the Sun will move into Pisces, so this is a very important transit for your finances. This is a fifty-fifty transit as Mercury and Venus is also there. There will be some discussions regarding your joint assets, and there are chances for arguments with your in laws. Someone will support you financially, or someone will share good news with you. Sudden financial gains also can come up, and you will be able to manage with whatever you have. You will also have an interest in healing and occult sciences as well.

horoscopes.title: Virgo Weekly Horoscope Starting February 15
content: The workplace will be very important as the solar eclipse will occur in the sixth house, so there will be sudden developments will occur in the work environment. It can be like a new role, new project, change in the duties, shift in the schedule, or the end of work situation. The sixth house indicates challenges, so you will have complex confrontations with your colleagues, so make sure you don’t take any bad step, which can ruin the good vibe at work. Your health also is important, as the solar eclipse is a kind of new moon, and it will bring new healthcare patterns.

The solar eclipse will aspect the twelfth house, so for the next six months, the emotional needs also will be very high. It will not be a path of roses, so you need to gather yourself physically and emotionally. You will be working hard to get some opportunities from the foreign lands. The twelfth house indicates foreign settlements, so if you were trying to get some updates about foreign travels, expect that in the next six months. You will be interested in prayer, spirituality and healing practices too. Martian aspect on the ninth house will bring opportunities to write and publish your articles.

The Sun will move into Pisces, and it will be influenced by Mercury and Venus as both are there. These three planets will highlight the seventh house of relationships, so you will have to deal with personal and business relationships. The Sun is not an ideal planet to be in the seventh house, so there are chances for unwanted arguments with your spouse or business partner. Venus is also there, so there will be some solutions for the problems too. There will be social gatherings like parties, business meets or some gatherings where you meet new people.

horoscopes.title: Libra Weekly Horoscope Starting February 15
content: During this week, a massive solar eclipse will rise in the air sign of Aquarius, which will impact your fifth house of creativity and children. The impact of the solar eclipse will last for the next six months, so you will see significant developments in the life of children, and your creative ventures. The solar eclipse is a kind of new moon, so the children will start some new projects, which can be academical or creative. These projects will be lasting for the next six months. Couples will take final decision about conception or they will take major decisions about children.

The fifth house also indicates love affairs, so those who are already in a relationship will take the relationship to the next level. Since Mars is also the part of this eclipse, there are chances for arguments in the relationship, so you have to be careful. You will think about starting a new creative venture, but make sure you don’t take any huge risk, as there are chances for issues too. Kindly avoid speculative ventures fully, otherwise you would not be able to recover the losses even after six months. There will be an increase in the social invitations too.

The Sun will move into Pisces, and it will conjunct Venus and Mercury there, so, you will work hard as the sixth house of the workplace will be triggered. These planets will surely increase the workload, and you have to be careful at work. There will be multiple opportunities to get a new job, a new project, or there will be back to back, and these projects will involve analysis, counting and numbering. There are chances for professional rivalry, so you need to be careful with your colleagues. Stress levels can increase, so you need to take care of your health too, especially the diet will be very important.

horoscopes.title: Scorpio Weekly Horoscope Starting February 15
content: You will have a lot of work at home, as this week will witness, as a powerful solar eclipse will impact the air sign of Aquarius. The solar eclipse will kick start events like real estate deals, construction, selling, buying or renovation at home. There will be costly purchases for home, or some projects for home improvement. You will also try to conduct some family meetings, where you take some crucial decisions about your home and family. The impact of the eclipse will last for the next six months, so you may majorly choose to live indoors more than even for the next six months.

Suddenly the domestic responsibilities will increase, and personal comfort will become your priority. Moving back to your birth place, purchase of vehicles, beginning of a home based business, and spiritual practices at home also can come up in the next six months. There will be parental involvement in your life, and you may not always like it. Mars is also the part of the eclipse, so you will have some arguments at home, which can last for the next six months. These six months span is very important as you will see significant changes in the home environment too.

The Sun will move into Pisces, and Venus are Mercury are already there, so your fifth house will be very active. A new love interest will come up, but make sure you are not in a hurry to give and take any promise as Mercury is debilitated here, so there will be misunderstanding between each other. Your creative ideas will flow easily, and you may even start such projects or discuss such possibilities with your team mates. Bonding with children also will increase, and you will be spending more time with children or youngsters. There will be some social gatherings, you will take up new hobbies and try to convert them as a profitable business.

horoscopes.title: Sagittarius Weekly Horoscope Starting February 15
content: The solar eclipse will rise in your third house, so for the next six months, you will be very busy, and there will be multitasking. Since the third house indicates communication, you will have a lot of projects from communication based domain like, teaching, writing, traveling, IT, sales and marketing too. There will be a sudden shift in the relationship with the siblings, and your neighbouring community, so you need to be careful with what you communicate with them. Online and offline meetings will surely come up, and that can also be full of arguments too. You may start a new course or a new certification, which can be short in nature.

Reconciliation with a sibling, transfers, short travels, and public speaking opportunities can also come up. You will see that your social media activities increasing, but avoid posting sensitive content, otherwise the issues can last for the next six months. Some of the documentation work will move forward, and you will see more opportunities for publishing too. Please be prepared for some sudden competitive activities like interviews, debates or even sports events. You will have to take up more responsibilities of your siblings, which may not be easy at all.

The Sun will move into Pisces, and it will join Venus and Mercury in this same sign. There will be some home improvement projects like renovation, or you will purchase some products for home to improve your standard of living. These planets can bring arguments at home, which will be a challenging situation, so please avoid anything can bring factions at home. Family functions or some meetings with the neighbouring community or friends can also come up. You will have to take up more responsibilities at home, so you will be spending more money and time for home. Venus will help you to solve the family issue diplomatically.

horoscopes.title: Capricorn Weekly Horoscope Starting February 15
content: The Capricorn Sun, Moon and rising signs will have a special focus on their career and finances, as the solar eclipse will trigger the second house, and this house indicates earning, and career too. Job seekers among you will get the closest opportunities to start their career, restart the career or even promotions too. This is a golden opportunity, so it will be good if you empower yourself with new skills. The impact of the solar eclipse will last for the next six months, so you have ample time to upskills, and that will surely support you in this pursuit.

The financial matters will be very sensitive, as the solar eclipse will bring money, but there will be expenses too. There will be family functions, and you will discuss important matters with your family members. You will restructure your financial plans, and you will get better financial pattern too. The second house indicates speech, so this eclipse will increase the harshness in the speech, and you should avoid that. In these six months, you will get chances for repayment, and you may clear your outstanding debts. Mars is also the part of this eclipse, so there are chances for sudden financial needs, and you need to be careful with that.

The Sun will move into Pisces, and Mercury and Venus will be here in the third house. These three planets will increase your courage, and you will try to take up some projects with your confidence. You will express your ideas boldly, and that will bring opportunities from media too. This transit will also bring public speaking opportunities, and you will find more friends through such events. There will be a lot of short traveling opportunities, and these back to back travelling can be challenging. Transfers, interdepartmental transfer or pleasure trips can also come up.

horoscopes.title: Aquarius Weekly Horoscope Starting February 15
content: This is a very important week for Aquarius Sun, Moon and rising signs, as a powerful solar eclipse will rise in your first house. Since this eclipse is taking place in your sign, so this is the time for personal transformation. You will try for an image makeover, as this eclipse will make you feel the need of new appearance. You will shed your old skin, and you will take some advice for such transformation too. This eclipse will support you to set new personal goals too, and you will get some support from your dear and near ones in this pursuit.

The solar eclipse will impact the seventh house, so the relationships also will be important. Some ego conflicts will arise in the relationships, and it can damage the relationships. There will be an unexpected acceleration in the marriage plans, so you have to foresee such situations. If you are already going through separation, then the situation can get aggravated in the next six months. Mars is also the part of eclipse, so the difference of opinion can be intense. You may also get opportunities to get new business contracts, new job offers or some offers from the foreign lands too.

The Sun will move into the second house, as it will enter Pisces, and Venus Mercury duo is also there. This is a good as well as complex transit, as Venus is a benefic, and Sun is a malefic, and Mercury is debilitated, so the financial matters are going to be important with gains as well as expenses. Voice related talents will come up so this is a good week for voice over artists. You will also get multiple opportunities to start a new job , or to get a new project, or you may even get opportunities for promotion.

horoscopes.title: Pisces Weekly Horoscope Starting February 15
content: The solar eclipse will rise in the air sign of Aquarius, so your twelfth house will get activated during this week. You may withdraw from social circles, but there will not be permanent detachment as the Sun will move into your first house after the eclipse. There will be some updates from the foreign lands, and it can be about foreign travel or foreign settlement. You will have secret plans, and don’t let others know about it. This transit will also bring charity ventures, and you will spend more for that. Sleep issues can also come up, but this is just for a short time.

The twelfth house indicates spirituality, so you will go for such practices, and you will also meet a healer, or some one living in isolation. Your sleep will have dreams which will make you highly intuitive about your future. The workplace also will be triggered by this eclipse, so some of you will start a new job, a new project, or some of you will leave the existing job. The twelfth house indicates expenses, so you will have to control that otherwise financial losses are also indicated. This is not a very promising time, so you need to adjust with it.

The Sun, Mercury and Venus will bring significant changes in your life, and Venus will balance the issues brought by solar ellipse. Your social visibility will surely increase, and you will find new opportunities to project yourself as a highly skilled person. Venus will make you a bit aware of your appearance, and you will go for image makeover sessions and people will appreciate the new look. New people will come up, and you will get new opportunities through them. Minor health issues can also come up, but they will vanish after sometime. However, three planets in your sign can make you a bit distracted.
